name: NYDailyNews
text:
No crowds, no cheering, no betting window lines.

Tiz the Law won the COVID-19 Belmont Stakes before an empty grandstand, becoming the first New York-bred horse to win the Belmont in 138 years.
https://t.co/uWHd0n0WI9

name: NYDailyNews

The fast-food restaurant went up in flames a week ago, one day after a cop shot fatally shot Rayshard Brooks at the drive-thru.

name: NYDailyNews
text:

The former University of Wyoming star was part of a formidable backfield that included his best friend, Hall of Fame fullback Larry Csonka.

text:
A dazzling blue guitar played by Prince pulled in $563,000 at auction.

Prince played the instrument on tour in the 1980s and ’90s. It has received multiple paint jobs, and Prince picked its strings while it wore peach, light blue, yellow and white hues.
